CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Segment__c, 'Enterprise & Strategic Financial & Insurance'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Segment__c, 'Enterprise & Strategic NSW 1'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Segment__c, 'Enterprise & Strategic NSW 2'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Segment__c, 'Enterprise & Strategic QLD'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Segment__c, 'Enterprise & Strategic VIC 1'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Segment__c, 'Enterprise & Strategic VIC 2'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Segment__c, 'Enterprise & Strategic VIC 3'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Segment__c, 'Lost to Competitor - Enterprise & Strategic') )
CustomField.label: Is Strategic Support Customer
